website_summaries.verdict: An attractive, multifunction training shoe at a reasonable price – the best deal available from Nike.
pros: Made of both mesh and synthetic leather for optimal air flow and dependable support
Tongue and collar are padded for extra comfort, and the no-sew construction reduces chafing
cons: Some testers found that they feel a bit tight, especially around the midsection of the foot
You may have to choose a half size larger

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow compared to other Nike models.
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the the reviews have said, these run extremely narrow compared to other nike styes. I do not have a wide foot at all and wear an 11 in all other nike shoes, but these were way too tight on the ball of the foot/pinky toe portion (width wise) of the shoe. Very tight on achilles tendon too. Returning, and will purchase another model besides the Zoom Speed TR3.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe, stable not mushy like running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe, stable not mushy like running shoes, unfortunately one of the lace eyelets tore off while lacing the shoes only the second time wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: John Baumann

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice looking shoe all Nike products are great
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking shoe all Nike products are great. But this shoe sits high on the ankle and rubs my ankle bone, it's quite uncomfortable, most nikes never do this to me, so that's why I did not give it 5 stars. I still wear them any ways as it's a good shoe otherwise.,
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome running shoes used these for Air Force ROTC during our PT sessions!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow (size up) but cool looking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, extremely narrow. I wear a size 10.5 but picked an 11 based on reviews and they were still too narrow. Returned for a size 11.5 and fits better. Otherwise the shoe is great. Nice design and color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, styling and material used
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 10.5 but went with sz 11 and these run a little tight on the width. Great design, styling and material used. Wish the laces be an inch longer.
customer_reviews.author: RBA

customer_reviews.title: My feet aren't terribly wide, so I assume that is why I ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my normal size. My feet aren't terribly wide, so I assume that is why I did not have to order a size up like many others. They also stretch a tad.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Warned by other reviews that these tend to have a tight fit, I ordered 1.5 sizes up from normal. It is still a little snug but I prefer my sneakers that way especially when lifting. No issues with them at the gym solid shoe for all types of lifts and movements.
customer_reviews.author: reader1

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes overall, fit is a little snug.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well, but may be on the smaller side of their true size. The area that is tightest is the flexible material around the toes. My foot is not wider than most, and it is still pretty snug. Seems to be the way a lot of Nike's fit now with the new mesh material. Overall, the shoes are great and I like them, hopefully you know what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally tight and difficult to fit foot into shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, but so exceptionally tight that my foot cramps when I wear them so I'd suggest a bigger size(though the length was perfect). It's difficult to fit into, which surprises me because I'm considered smaller than average at 5'6 and I don't have hobbit feet(or DO I?, haha).
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy L

customer_reviews.title: great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: best lifting shoes ever. great fit, breathable. easy to clean and i like that the tongue of the shoe is attached and wont slide around like most shoes do. very snug so theyre perfect for training legs or running. great look, i get complemented on these all the time. i have 3 other pairs in different colors
customer_reviews.author: Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Look good and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these and says they are comfortable and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.Perry

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are super feather-weight but just a little more tight-fitting than the ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are super feather-weight but just a little more tight-fitting than the cross-trainers that I usually buy from Nike. But overall, they look great and since they are so tight they have great grip.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Merideth

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and look good. I have doubts as to how well they'd hold up to serious cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: TIGHT & NARROW
customer_reviews.text: These shoe are light and looks great. Everyone's comments on how tight and narrow about the shoes are completely correct. Recommended to atleast get 1/2 size bigger than normal would be wise. Almost feel like its cutting circulation to feet. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: john kounlavong

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, bit narrow. Go 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these because they are very comfortable and look great. Got a 1/2 size larger this time and the fit is much better. These seems to run a bit narrow so the 1/2 size up fixed that on my 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: G.C.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely need to order a half size up! Way ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need to order a half size up! Way tighter than expected, and my toe runs into the tip with my usual size.
customer_reviews.author: OldtoysNewplastic

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe but they do run narrow. I wear thin socks so they are good but did go up 1/2 size. Great color combo.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Zane

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: These were for my husband. The shoes are nice but run too small very tight around the toes
customer_reviews.author: leila Mansoor

customer_reviews.title: and they fit great. I love the way they look and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I read that these shoes run small so I ordered a full size larger (11 1/2 instead of my normal 10 1/2) , and they fit great. I love the way they look and they are perfect for CrossFit. Highly recommended, as long as you factor in the size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Gym!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. I wouldn't do any long runs in them, but they offer enough support to do shorter intervals and such. They are also great for lifting, so these have become my new all-around gym shoe. Heeding the advice I've read in the reviews, I went a half size up, and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... did go a half size up and they fit great. My feet are a little on the wide ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews about these running small so I did go a half size up and they fit great. My feet are a little on the wide side, so they are snug that way, but not to where they are uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and I've bought two pair so far.
customer_reviews.author: srwish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the shoes, but too small. Will return for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Durling-Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes run small and narrow. Can only wear them for an hour are so before my feet start hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Estrello

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light and fits snug. Go up at least 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: jgprior58

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Light weight and look great. They do run small like others have said. Get a half size bigger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: beautiful shoes but too narrow. had to return and pay for 80% of the cost of the return....
customer_reviews.text: beautiful shoes but too narrow. had to return and pay for 80% of the cost of the return...
customer_reviews.author: eduardo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cool shoes but the size runs really small get a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley B.

customer_reviews.title: Then If want more roomfor your feet to breath then 1 size larger is good.
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 12 but my feet only 11.5 and I always have extra room but not on this shoe. So just buy .5 extra. Then If want more roomfor your feet to breath then 1 size larger is good.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Paul Casipe

customer_reviews.title: Everything about the shoes were great except that they were too tight around the sides
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the shoes were great except that they were too tight around the sides. And I don't have wide feet. I'm exchanging them for a half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits small, but look great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these shoes look but they fit small. They didn't have a bigger size so I'm going to live through the pain.
customer_reviews.author: J.C

customer_reviews.title: but they broke in super fast. One of the most comfortable pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes felt a little tight at first, but they broke in super fast. One of the most comfortable pair of shoes I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: a.a.ron

customer_reviews.title: Shoe size
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is hard to get into. Once on the foot, it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. White

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These run small so make sure to purchase two yes two sizes larger.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Martini

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby as a Valentine gift, he loves them! My only caution is that they stain easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them as I could not comfortably wear them -
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but way too small ordered a 12 generally an 11 and still way to tight/small
customer_reviews.author: Mommie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe, Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these, but def runs small. I wear an 8.5 in Asics and these, in a men's 7, feel like a women's 8. Def going to order again but I'm going up a size and ordering a men's 8 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lane

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these shoes to both train my clients and myself
customer_reviews.text: I work as a personal trainer. I absolutely love these shoes to both train my clients and myself. On top of that they look amazing on your feet. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gym workout shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Widest Nike's I've found. Definitely runs a size smaller; I wear a US10, but in these I wear US11. Best gym workout shoes I've ever owned. Light, stable, and look cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good appearance but not fit as expected. Its very tight to wear though I order half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: $id

customer_reviews.title: it feels too tight on my feet so they are not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were just ok, it feels too tight on my feet so they are not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lopez1974

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe design, but it fits tight, and I already ordered a half size larger
customer_reviews.author: Antonio tamer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style, however feels a bit narrow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes everyday they've always been very comfortable and I have gotten many compliments for its interesting design.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size. Too tight around the front half of my foot

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits a little tighter then my other Nike shoes.

customer_reviews.title: ... to be broken in just a little bit really like

customer_reviews.title: but they're still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat small fitment on top the foot, but they're still comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Clatterbuck

customer_reviews.title: The perfect shoe for lifting not meant to do anything else ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit was true to size. The perfect shoe for lifting not meant to do anything else however.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Walsh

customer_reviews.title: 5 but I like my sneakers tight so it works for
customer_reviews.text: It fits tight for a 9.5 but I like my sneakers tight so it works for me
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I will return this soon I'm a size 9 and this one is super snug!! Not true to size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe was size 11 like I ordered and the left one was a 9.5".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size not actually a 10
customer_reviews.text: Fits small. I ordered a 10 and have been that shoe size my whole audit life. Hurts the big toes.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Ross

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe for running and lifting
customer_reviews.text: This shoe definitely runs smaller. It's great for lifting and running. I love it. They are also very stylish and get lots of compliments! You
customer_reviews.author: alberto munoz

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. I typically wear a 9.5 but in Nike I wear a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, and is a little wider than some other Nike shoes which is why I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe however it is a very narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe however it is a very narrow fit. My feet start tingling and falling asleep after 45 minutes at the gym. I own at least 8 Nike shoes and all are the same 10.5 size, but only this show is too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Snug
customer_reviews.text: These are about a half size smaller than I expected them to be with my previous knowledge of Nike shoes. I almost always wear a 9.5 in Nike and 10 in other shoes, but in this particular shoe, I should have ordered a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan E

customer_reviews.title: I got these for my wife who normally has issues ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife who normally has issues with shoes having "too much" arch support. She won't wear normal running shoes for long period of time because they hurt her feet as a result. With these shoes, she does not have any pain or discomfort and can wear them all day. She uses them for work, running, and light weight lifting.
customer_reviews.author: George Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe and look! Very narrow though, and I don't have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are comfortable, fit as expected but a bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable, fit as expected but a bit narrow. Overall I love the design of these shoes! I work at a hospital so shoes are the only way to personalize our scrub uniforms. I get compliments from my coworkers, patients, and visitors whenever I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: LMA

customer_reviews.title: Horrific fit
customer_reviews.text: Ensure you move a 1/2 or full size up when purchasing these shoes. In fact, you may want to try them on at a local store before purchasing them blindly. Shoes look great but are flat and have no arch support; feel is akin to sandals. Even with the laces removed I could not fit in my 9.5 size shoes. Expensive shoes that feel like Walmart specials.
customer_reviews.author: dean tassone

customer_reviews.title: Had the old version of these shoes. The new ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the old version of these shoes. The new fit is waaaay too small. You'd have to go up a size or two for them to fit the width and then the shoes will be way too long.
customer_reviews.author: Dusti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome shoes. I usually wear 9.5, I have 1 pair that fit from the Nike Outlet store in 9.5, but for these grey ones I needed a 10
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: but in a good way that provides a very snug and stable fit
customer_reviews.text: Using these shoes for running and some light crossfit workouts. The shoe is narrow, but in a good way that provides a very snug and stable fit. Excellent for running/spring work.
customer_reviews.author: George Cagle

customer_reviews.title: Great Nike Training Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these training shoes. They are very comfortable and look good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: THE SHOE LOOKS GREAT..
customer_reviews.text: THE SHOE LOOKS GREAT...I LOVE IT BUT I AM A SIZE 11 AND I BOUGHT A SIZE 11.5....I WORE IT JUST ONE NIGHT....I WAS IN PAIN ALL NIGHT LONG....MY FEET WERE CRAMPING I GOT A BLISTER TO THE BACK OF MY FEET. AND JUST BY THE WAY IT FITS I KNOW A 12 WILL LOOK TO LONG
customer_reviews.author: Jared E.

customer_reviews.title: and very comfortable. I also get lots of compliments on them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are high quality, light, and very comfortable. I also get lots of compliments on them. Easy to put on, since it has a thiner front flap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My usual size is 8. 5 but these were ...
customer_reviews.text: My usual size is 8.5 but these were too small, had to return for a size 9
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
